duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, develop, and maintain innovative systems for Amazon Pharmacy.
Build scalable, reliable, and secure solutions to redefine the pharmacy experience for customers.
Contribute to a broad tech stack consisting of both first party and third party applications.
Automate solutions or remediate ticket drivers at their root cause in general maintenance requests.
Participate in an on-call rotation to stay available for urgent or high severity issues.
Collaborate with a team to resolve high severity events and support Amazon Pharmacy operations.
Don multiple hats, including exposure/administration/collaboration with large scale first party services and software development teams.
Work on workforce management, customer communication channels, and operations workflows.

education_certification.credential: Knowledge of at least one modern programming language such as C, C++, Java, or Perl.
Experience on highly concurrent, high throughput systems and knowledge of complex distributed systems.
